pr_title: Add validation for missing file(s) in .dockstore.yml

timeline.message: added validation for missing file(s) in .dockstore.yml

timeline.bodyText:
If so inclined, you could rewrite this and the for loop with map and filter. But it's fine the way it is.
Feel free to ignore this; I'm just personally liking the FP style more.
timeline.author: coverbeck

timeline.bodyText:
Use List on the left unless you really rely on ArrayList
https://java2blog.com/java-list-vs-arraylist/
timeline.author: denis-yuen

timeline.message: used filter and map instead of for loop
